name: Under Lock and Key
description:
A single-player three-dimensional puzzler game developed for mobile-based platforms, which adopts an escape-the-room gameplay orientation and offers an established narrative development through audio queues, animation sequences, and a sinister-like aesthetic.

The basis of the game follows the narrative of the player, who is at first, captured and then imprisoned in a housed environment, featuring a series of interconnected rooms that encapsulate interactive puzzles. The player's objective is to interact with their environment using basic numeracy and physical aptitudes to solve each puzzle. For each puzzle that the player solves, escape becomes increasingly possible.
